humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that 'Number of lymph nodes with macrometastases (>0.2 cm): 0', 'Number of lymph nodes with micrometastases (>0.2 mm to 0.2 cm and/or >200 cells): 0', and 'Number of lymph nodes with isolated tumor cells (<0.2 mm and <=200 cells): 0'. This information, combined with the fact that there is no mention of any positive lymph nodes in the report, supports the prediction of N0, which indicates no metastatic carcinoma in regional lymph nodes.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that there were a total of 11 lymph nodes examined, and none of them contained carcinoma (0/11). Therefore, the pathologic N stage for this patient is N0.
